outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Halt! State your business, stranger. We don't take kindly to troublemakers around here.

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: I mean no harm. I'm just passing through.

outputs.name: Option 3
outputs.value: I seek an audience with the village elder. Can you point me in the right direction?

outputs.name: Option 4
outputs.value: Is there anything interesting happening in town these days?

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Passing through, huh? Keep your nose clean, and you won't have any problems with us. We're here to keep the peace.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: The [color=blue][b]Elder's hut[/b][/color] is near the center of the village, just past the [color=blue][b]Market square[/b][/color]. Be respectful when you speak with him. He is the wisest soul in these parts.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Not much excitement here. Our life is usually peaceful, thanks to our watchful eyes. The [color=blue][b]Tavern[/b][/color] sometimes has a bard who'll spin a tale or two, if that's your fancy.
